css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);position:absolute;top:0px;right:0px;bottom:0px;left:0px;justify-content:center;min-width:initial;height:100% !important;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u .maxi-image-block-wrapper{justify-content:center;overflow:hidden;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u .maxi-image-block-wrapper img{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);min-width:initial;height:100%;width:100%;left:0%;top:0%;-o-object-position:50% 50%;object-position:50% 50%;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u figcaption{text-align:left;width:100%;margin-top:1em;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u .maxi-hover-details{min-width:initial;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u > .maxi-background-displayer{z-index:1;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-1,255,255,255),0.7);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u a figcaption.maxi-image-block__caption{color:var(--maxi-light-link,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-4,255,74,23),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-fb31f5f7-u a
